tool_description: A comprehensive API that provides real-time sports news headlines, articles, and search functionality.
name: Real-time Sports News API
title: Real-time Sports News API

api_list.name: sources-by-category
api_list.description: Fetches news sources filtered by a specific category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-sports-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/sources-by-category?category=sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-sports-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: article-search
api_list.description: Searches articles based on optional parameters such as title, author, and url.

api_list.name: articles-by-source
api_list.description: Fetches articles from a specific news source based on the provided source parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-sports-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles-by-source?source=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.espn.com%2Fespn%2Frss%2Fnews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-sports-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
